author: Nicole A
title: Nice stay with friendly staff
text:
We stayed at this hotel through RCI for a week in early March.
We were in Paris for sightseeing, and while the hotel was not in the heart of the tourist areas, it was close to a metro station.
The room was nice and clean with comfortable beds, and the staff was very friendly. We never ate in the restaurant, so I cannot comment on that aspect.
I agree with other commenters that the neighborhood is not the nicest, and perhaps I would not feel comfortable walking alone there at night, but with my husband, I never had any issues.
One piece of advice is to take your shower at night. The water was not very hot in the mornings because most people were showering then, but it was perfect at night!
